notes: Second generation compact SUV final US years (2005-2013 in US). 2.4L I4 introduced 2009. Suzuki exited US market 2012. Data sourced from Wikipedia Suzuki Grand Vitara article, January 2025 revision.
Compact sedan/hatchback (2007-2013 in US). Joint development with Fiat. AWD available. Final model before US exit. Data sourced from Wikipedia Suzuki SX4 article, January 2025 revision.

Midsize sedan (2009-2013). Suzuki's premium sedan effort. Sport and GTS trims. AWD available. Discontinued with US market exit. Data sourced from Wikipedia Suzuki Kizashi article, January 2025 revision.
Rebadged Nissan Frontier on D40 platform (2008-2012). Built by Nissan in Tennessee. Final Suzuki vehicle in US. Data sourced from Wikipedia Suzuki Equator article, January 2025 revision.
